official_title: A bill to authorize the construction of a navigation project on the Sacramento River Deep Water Ship Channel.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a navigation project on the Sacramento River Deep Water Ship Channel, California, at an estimated Federal cost of $66,000,000. States that there shall be no requirement for a State share and that the non-Federal recreation interest shall be credited with the replacement value of existing recreation facilities.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the construction of a navigation project on the Sacramento River Deep Water Ship Channel.
